use.flag: Enable Adaptive Multi-Rate format support via media-libs/opencore-amr.
Enable DTS Coherent Acoustics audio encoder support via media-sound/dcaenc.
Adds support for encoding AAC using media-libs/fdk-aac.
Enable unicode bidirectional algorithm support via dev-libs/fribidi.
Adds support for NVIDIA Encoder (NVENC) API for hardware accelerated encoding on NVIDIA cards.
Enable TwoLAME support via media-sound/twolame, an optimised MPEG Audio Layer 2 (MP2) encoder.
Enable WebM VP8 Codec SDK support via media-libs/libvpx.

pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package should be merged with media-video/avidemux. From https://www.avidemux.org/admWiki/doku.php?id=build:install_2.6: "Everything is a module in 2.6, so without plugins you can't do anything. The plugins either belong to the common part (they work with all UIs) or a specific part (they only work with one)."
